                                    **Josh/the founder and curator**

## **BIO**
Josh is an accomplished researcher specializing in phytopathology, with a focus on mycology and plant diseases. His research area focuses on understanding of plant diseases, including soil-borne pathogens, fungal physiology, and fungal biotechnology. He has contributed to the evaluation of fungicides for disease control of cocoa disease in Ghana and is actively involved in teaching and mentoring. With a strong academic background, notable publications, and worked as a Mycologist at the Cocoa Research Institute of Ghana, Josh is a dedicated professional making significant contributions to the field of phytopathology. Currently doing y PhD in Agricultural Sciences at UNH, majoring plant disease control.
